short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A convenient tool for Student Central users, designed to enhance the Edpuzzle experience and streamline tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Student Central Helper Tool is a user-friendly browser extension designed to streamline your  experience on Student Central. With just a single click, this intuitive tool simplifies various tasks, allowing you to focus on your learning experience. The extension is easy to install and seamlessly integrates with the Student Central platform, making it an essential tool for students and teachers alike. Enhance your productivity and make the most of your time on Student Central with the help of this innovative and efficient browser extension.
